titles.title: Social Security Tax Hike Phaseout Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to phaseout the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits.
Social Security Tax Hike Phaseout Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Social Security Tax Hike Phaseout Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from 85 to 60 percent the maximum applicable percentage of social security benefits includable in the gross income of a taxpayer. Phases in this reduction between 2005 and 2008. Appropriates to the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund amounts equal to the reduction in revenues to the Treasury by reason of the enactment of this Act.
